markdown:
| icon           = poe2 ring_silver_claw icon.png
| description    = Rings such as this are favored by archers and gunfighters for the great advantage they offer in ranged combat. This small, claw-shaped piece of jewelry contains a charm that heightens the coordination between hand and eye, improving one's aim. Many marksmen claim that particularly potent rings know the perfect instant to loose an arrow or squeeze a trigger, and will do so of their own accord.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Fingers

| requirements   =

| location       = * [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/): Worn by [Shrimp](/shrimp/) on top of [The Wild Mare](/theWildMare/) during [A Bigger Fish](/aBiggerFish/). Can be obtained by pickpocketing (require [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/) 7) or killing him.
| guid           =50ce5057-ff60-4b92-b22b-10ea440df246
}}
'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Ring}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

##  Notes 

* As Shrimp is surrounded by [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) sailors. You'll need high [Stealth](/stealth/) and [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/) 7 to pickpocket it.
* If you [Stealth](/stealth/) is not high enough. You can lure him to [Zili Valera](/ziliValera/) during [A Bigger Fish](/aBiggerFish/), then talk to him during his walk to Zili, this will make him stop for a little a while, thus separating him from his friends, then use this chance to pickpocket before he could get to his destination.

== Notes ==
* As Shrimp is surrounded by [[Royal Deadfire Company]] sailors. You'll need high [[Stealth]] and [[Sleight of Hand]] 7 to pickpocket it.
* If you [[Stealth]] is not high enough. You can lure him to [[Zili Valera]] during [[A Bigger Fish]], then talk to him during his walk to Zili, this will make him stop for a little a while, thus separating him from his friends, then use this chance to pickpocket before he could get to his destination.
